main event: Two elliptical objects were observed flashing on and off at an altitude of 15,000 feet, moving away from each other and then coming back together.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes., The objects were described as elliptical., The visibility was at an altitude of 15,000 feet., Insufficient data was available for evaluation of the incident., The report is from Project Blue Book dated 5 November 1956.
sighted object: two elliptical objects in the sky
